review: I bought it as an apple tv alternative since I own a FreeNAS server and just wanted to use for the Plex media server to watch movies and tv shows. I launch the Plex media server app through the iPhone 4S and stream to chromecast whala !!! I also carry the chromecast with me when we go visit friends or family members to keep the kids entertained, streaming videos from my FreeNAS server at my house. The Plex app streams directly from the server to the chromecast, not from server to iPhone, then from iPhone to chromecast.
author: tono-sty

review: I want to love this product, I really do. And I think I would if I wasn't trying to use it in my apartment on my university's internet - it just doesn't work since you have to log in to the internet with your campus key and password. I think if I was using this at home, I would absolutely love it. Just be wary if you're getting it for a dorm or hotel or anywhere that you don't control the wi-fi yourself!
